name: Frostfang Sea
description: Within these frigid waters floats the island of Erollis, and the city of New Halas!

npcs.name: Barker Gordon
utterances: Good day to you, stranger! I am Barker Gordon, a native of New Halas.
Could I interest you in some work?
I've been asked to make my recipe for ham and halasian beans for the New Halas City Festival. We want to impress all of our visitors!

I've been raising a pig just for this occasion. I would normally slaughter him myself, but this time I've become too attached to him. I fear that I would not have the strength to see a clean cut through.
I knew ye would understand!  I should have listened to others and not named him.
I promise that it will be worth it! My pig's name is Bentor the Mighty. Bentor is in the pen next to the mender's workshop, The Stone Hammer, up in New Halas proper.

npcs.name: a Far Seas dockhand
utterances: The Far Seas Trading Company is always looking for a few strong backs and brave souls.

npcs.name: Joren Kalth
utterances: Hello! You look like a capable adventurer, come speak with me!
